Summary: i seen it in my backyard it was round very bright white then changed shap and colors
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at home watching tv when i heard the dogs barking so i went outside.my pittbull was barking and looking up at the sky its a dense fog i looked back down tought maybe he had seen a deer in the yard .but he was still looking up then the sky lit up bright white round light.I looked over at it it was over the trees in my back yard i had a spotlight so i shined it over at it.to try and see what it was tought maybe a air plane light or somthing but made no sound flashed my spotlight and it changed colors from white to red to silver then back to white then it went outand now it looked like a egg when it came back on red and changed to a yellowish orange it moved down very slow and was changed colors fast all of a sudden it moved up about well i say 60 feet stopped and changed back to white then flew stright up like a streak and was gone.i am sitting here shaking still i have not told anyonei just looked back outside and you cannot see a star in the sky because of the fog it now is 12.20 am oct 30 2008
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Roxboro
There were no other sightings in Roxboro on or around October 29th 2008
